name: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

name: Titanic
description: A love story set against the backdrop of the Titanic disaster.

name: Toy Story
description: A story about the secret life of toys when humans are not around.

name: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his army.

name: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish embarks on a journey to find his lost son.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

name: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

name: Frozen
description: A princess sets off on a journey to find her estranged sister, whose icy powers have trapped their kingdom in eternal winter.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in violent and unexpected ways.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: Coco
description: A young musician embarks on a journey in the Land of the Dead to uncover his family's history.

name: The Lion King
description: A lion cub flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

name: Shrek
description: An ogre embarks on a quest to rescue a princess with the help of his talkative donkey friend.

name: Deadpool
description: A former special forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to an experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

name: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to his transformation into the iconic criminal mastermind.

name: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes attempts to live a quiet suburban life while facing a new villain.

name: Braveheart
description: A Scottish warrior leads a revolt against English rule in the 13th century.

name: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the alien world.

name: Up
description: An elderly man and a young scout embark on an adventure in a floating house carried by balloons.

name: Logan
description: An aging Wolverine must protect a young mutant girl who has abilities similar to his own.

name: A Quiet Place
description: A family must live in silence to avoid being hunted by creatures that track by sound.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of a better future.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A hotel's legendary concierge becomes entangled in a mystery involving a stolen painting and a vast family fortune.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate the lives of a wealthy household.

name: Soul
description: A jazz musician must find his way back to life after an accident separates his soul from his body.

name: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory, where his teacher pushes him to the limit.

name: Inside Out
description: A young girl's emotions struggle to guide her through a life-changing move.

name: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a battle for the desert planet Arrakis, home to the most valuable substance in the universe.

name: Jaws
description: A police chief, a marine scientist, and a fisherman hunt a deadly great white shark terrorizing a beach town.

name: The Social Network
description: The rise of Facebook and the legal battles that followed its creation.

name: The Green Mile
description: A death row corrections officer forms a bond with an inmate with mysterious healing abilities.

name: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians engage in a lifelong battle to create the ultimate illusion.

name: Ratatouille
description: A rat with culinary dreams forms an unlikely partnership with a young chef in a Parisian restaurant.
